mergeResults.content: IDENTITY: Queen's Own Companion. Greeted Senta at Haven Collegium, offered support. Recognized urgency of situation.

IDENTITY: Queen's Own Companion. Greeted Senta at Haven Collegium, offered support. Recognized urgency of situation.

Circle meeting: Positioned himself beside Rance throughout—silent endorsement lending legitimacy. Monitored situation with centuries of perspective. Grave concern tempered with hope.

finalContent:
IDENTITY: Queen's Own Companion. Greeted Senta at Haven Collegium, offered support. Recognized urgency of situation.

Circle meeting: Positioned himself beside Rance throughout—silent endorsement lending legitimacy. Monitored situation with centuries of perspective. Grave concern tempered with hope.
